warlockMod:Corruption.NAME: Corruption
warlockMod:Corruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage over 6 turns. warlockmod:Affliction. warlockmod:Curse.

warlockMod:Immolate.NAME: Immolate
warlockMod:Immolate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage immediately, and !M! + 5 more over 5 turns. warlockmod:Destruction. warlockmod:Curse.

warlockMod:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
warlockMod:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. If the target is affected by Immolate, gain 1 Energy. warlockmod:Destruction.

warlockMod:CurseOfAgony.NAME: Curse of Agony
warlockMod:CurseOfAgony.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage over 8 turns. warlockmod:Affliction. warlockmod:Curse.

warlockMod:SummonVoidwalker.NAME: Summon Voidwalker
warlockMod:SummonVoidwalker.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Voidwalker warlockmod:Demon, which grants !M! Block each turn. Costs 1 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. warlockmod:Demonology.

warlockMod:CurseOfWeakness.NAME: Curse of Weakness
warlockMod:CurseOfWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Apply [#87ceeb]2[] Weak. Reduce the target's Strength by up to [#87ceeb]2[], but not below !M!. warlockmod:Affliction.

warlockMod:FelArmor.NAME: Fel Armor
warlockMod:FelArmor.DESCRIPTION: Increase your self-healing from from Warlock spells and Healthstones by 40%. warlockmod:Demonology.

warlockMod:DemonArmor.NAME: Demon Armor
warlockMod:DemonArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Artifact. At the end of each turn, gain !M! Block. warlockmod:Demonology.

warlockMod:Conflagrate.NAME: Conflagrate
warlockMod:Conflagrate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. If the target is affected by Immolate, draw a card. Your next 2 Incinerates or Chaos Bolts deal 35% increased damage. warlockmod:Destruction.

warlockMod:SearingPain.NAME: Searing Pain
warlockMod:SearingPain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. If the target is affected by Immolate, add 5 damage and extend it by one turn. warlockmod:Destruction.

warlockMod:DrainSoul.NAME: Drain Soul
warlockMod:DrainSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage and gain a [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. warlockmod:Affliction.

warlockMod:Shadowburn.NAME: Shadowburn
warlockMod:Shadowburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. Costs 1 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. If the target dies this turn, gain 1 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. Does not stack. warlockmod:Destruction.

warlockMod:ChaosBolt.NAME: Chaos Bolt
warlockMod:ChaosBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. If you have Conflagrate, gain 3 Energy. Costs 3 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shards[]. warlockmod:Destruction.

warlockMod:CreateHealthstone.NAME: Create Healthstone
warlockMod:CreateHealthstone.DESCRIPTION: Create a Healthstone potion, which restores 10% health on use. Costs 1 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. Exhaust. warlockmod:Demonology.

warlockMod:UnstableAffliction.NAME: Unstable Affliction
warlockMod:UnstableAffliction.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Artifact from the target. Deal !M! damage over 6 turns. Costs 1 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. warlockmod:Affliction. warlockmod:Curse.

warlockMod:DeathCoil.NAME: Death Coil
warlockMod:DeathCoil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage and self-healing. Apply [#87ceeb]2[] Weak. Draw a card. Exhaust. warlockmod:Affliction.

warlockMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
warlockMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
warlockMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

warlockMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
warlockMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

warlockMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
warlockMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !warlockMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

warlockMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
warlockMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !warlockMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
